name: Koji the Frog - Game A Week 6
name_original: Koji the Frog - Game A Week 6
description:
This a very janky game made in a week about frogs. Eat bugs, get swoll, don't get eaten by the birb. AND NEVER THOUCH THE WATER.

INTRUCTIONS:

A and D to rotate

Space to Jump

Drag and Click to Aim and Shoot

OFFICAL LORE:

There once was a lil' froggo called Koji. The End.

(Shoutout to havacow for the name suggestion, Koji The Frog is a 90s MAC OS 7 arcade game by Slimyfrog Software, Macro Carra). This game is now post-
